Text Input Notes

Paste any text content and transform it into well-structured, comprehensive notes.

How to use:

  • Copy text from articles, books, research papers, or any source
  • Paste it in the text area below
  • Add an optional title to organize your notes
  • Click "Generate Notes" to create structured summaries

Tip: The more detailed your input text, the more comprehensive and useful your generated notes will be.
